mapper.select: select * from (select * from (SELECT * FROM mt_1_place UNION SELECT * FROM mt_2_place UNION SELECT * FROM mt_3_place UNION SELECT * FROM mt_4_place UNION SELECT * FROM mt_5_place UNION SELECT * FROM mt_6_place UNION SELECT * FROM mt_7_place UNION SELECT * FROM mt_8_place) order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) WHERE ROWNUM < 10
